Data Science: where is your next job?

Our motivation

A paragraph with a floating image. A paragraph with a floating image. A paragraph with a floating image.

Methods

data

The macro-economic situation in data science industry embeded in background part were retrieved from the Bureau of Labour Statistics website-Occupational Employment Statistics:

  1. National data:National Occupational Employment Status and Wage Estimates from US Bureau of Labour Statistics (using data of year 2017)

  2. State data:National Occupational Employment Status and Wage Estimates from US Bureau of Labour Statistics (using data covering 2007 until 2017)

  3. Indeed retrieved data: Data Scientist Job Posts in the U.S on Indeed Website in 2018 August

  4. Comparison of fortune 500 U.S companies and non fortune 500 U.S companies are based on Data from The 500 Largest Industrial Corporations in the U.S., Published by Fortune magazine (updated by October 5, 2018)

Analysis

For the purpose of working with job description text stored as strings in R, we removed stop words from the text before we searched for words or phrases occurring at high frequency among the text. Occasionally throughout our navigating progress, we have to adjust the stop words library in order to keep some case and letter sensitive word, for example, software languages R, C, or C++.

Results

Reviewing U.S. job market of data scientists in recent 10 years
